content: BOC Family Card YouTrip Credit Card Asked by Caleb Seah Hua XiangAsked on 03 Nov 2018If I use BOC Family Card to top up YouTrip, is it counted as an online transaction to get the 5% Rebates?2 answersAnswerBump2
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

PatLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 25 Jun 2019Sorry this is late but it doesn't! Payment to prepaid accounts like Youtrip is excluded.Reference: 1(b)(iii) https://cloud.bankofchina.com/sgp/boc_cc/media/documents/Terms_and_Conditions_Governing_BOC_Family_Credit_Card_Cash_Rebate_Programme.pdf0 comments2

Png Cheng Xi Damien, Happy Life Seeker at HomeLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 03 Nov 2018Yes it counts as online spend to get 5% rebate. So does favepay, grabpay, and even Singtel online prepaid topup.0 comments0
